name: Political Compass: ARENA
description:
An absurd piece of shit program where you make Hitler, Mao, Rand, and Gandhi fight each other.  

THEIR WEAPONS: some politically-weaponizable texts maybe associated with them! (or whatever texts you choose!)

Download the starter texts below and input them, or use texts of your own. SPACE bar swaps the camera between combatants.  'K' commits suicide.

Be sure to check out readme.txt for info on how the program works, bad ASCII art, and games you can play using this software with your friends (or by yourself, if you're a sad degenerate like me).
